message.title: Not Approved
message.body: Please make the following revisions and resubmit.

message.title: Incorrect Branding
message.body: This content uses incorrect or outdated terms, images, and/or colors. Please correct and re-submit.

message.title: Typos
message.body: This content has multiple misspellings and/or grammatical errors. Please correct and re-submit.

message.title: Broken Links
message.body: This content has non-working links that may be due to incomplete and/or misspelled URLs. Any links directing users to websites without the Acme.com primary navigation, or directing users to a document must open in a new browser window. Please correct and re-submit.

message.title: Needs Section Owner's Approval
message.body: This content needs the approval of its section's owner to insure there is no negative impact on other pages/areas of section, etc. Once you have their approval please email the Web Marketing Operations Team and re-submit this Go Live request.

general-messages.message:
The {siteName} Website Marketing Team processes all Go Live requests each business day, between 4 and 6:00pmE, unless a specific date/time is requested.

All requests received after 4:00pmE may not be processed until the next business day.

If you have any questions about this policy or need a Go Live request processed immediately, please email the Web Marketing Operations Team.
